txt.en: Whatever Balin accomplished here, this site is no longer safe for any miner
'Where did they come from!? Quickly! Run! I'll hold them off!'
Gufi believes that you are exaggerating the dangers you encountered during your scouting mission, and has asked you to scout a prospective mining site from Balin's time.
'Hmm. There are rather more of them than I was expecting down here...'
A grim silence pervades the mine, interrupted only by the alien sounds of the Gredbyg. Discover what you can of Balin's mining expedition.
'Shall we take a little stroll, then?'
You have found the picks of Balin's miners, and naught else but danger.
